name: Dark Chocolate Marbled Banana Bread with Greek Yogurt
author: Chef V
summary: I created this recipe using my favorite parts of many different recipes. This bread isn't very sweet, so it's not for those who enjoy a sweeter bread. The chocolate throughout makes this a beautiful bread to entertain with.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Whisk hot water and cocoa powder in a large bowl until smooth
Combine mashed bananas, Greek yogurt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract in another large bowl; mix well
Fold in flour mixture until thoroughly combined
Mix half of the banana mixture into the cocoa mixture until well combined
Spoon banana mixture and cocoa mixture into the prepared pan, alternating between the two
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes
